data.message: The last 5 seconds make me think that this song is not the true model of the entire CD. Beyoncé will only allow him to be listened by more people and to get more popularity, on the RADIO too, like Rihanna did in the last years.

replies.message: He's sold more albums than Beyonce and Rhianna combined.
You think he need B or Ry for anything???? His biggest song over the last 6 years was Rap God ..
I'm talking about hearing him on the RADIO in ITALY. If you don't or can't read, it's not my fault.
Danny Goodlet  Eminem has sold about 155 million albums while Rhianna has sold 240 million albums.
Bcause of the last 5 seconds... i think he will turn slim shady or just spaz out
Matthew Causey Wow! What in the literal fuck? I thought you were joking and had to look it up. That's fckn crazy! Who buys that trash??

True.Just twisted right? Not entire all song in whole album
Beyonce sucks instead he should have take Sia

But in america he doesn't need them cuz the rap genre is the favorite in america

Matthew eminem sold 155 million in america while ry sold 240 worldwide 
Eminem is the 6st most selling artist since neilsen soundscan era

Cause eminem hasn't been AROUND SINCE THE 90'S. HE DOESN'T NEED POPULARITY. HE NEEDS HIS STANS BITCH.
Rihanna that 240m includes everything albums and singles  everything. ..Eminem has sold more albums than rihanna and Danny Goodlet beyonce has sold over 100m as solo and over 60m with Destiny's child
Aurora gets it, true like it or not a song with beyonce or rihanna will top the charts no doubt its not like eminem need them but it is a way to promote for the album and sell more...
If you know Eminem at all, you'll know that he doesn't give a fuck about fame. Especially with a song like this? I doubt he did this for popularity.

He did this for genuine openness about his expectations.

Also I doubt it get very popular with his unpopular opinion with an not so liked president

Samytune Zimba Beyonce has sold 17 million as a solo artist and 17 million as a member of Destinys Child. She hasn't put out the same amount of music that Rhianna has, but I have no idea has she's sold 230 million. It makes no sense.

Danny Goodlet People are making a mistake there is a difference between ALBUMS and RECORDs Rihanna has only sold about 10 million albums in the US ..and Eminem has over 40 million albums sold in the US
